detail_desc: Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in sturdy cotton twill with adjustable shoulder straps and buttons at the top. Patch front pockets with a decorative flap and button, back pockets and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Oversized, jacquard-knit cardigan with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Metal earrings with plastic beads in various shapes. Length 12.5 cm.
Chelsea boots in suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and leather insoles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.

Short-sleeved, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Wide-fitting, slightly longer top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and 3/4-length sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Soft, fully lined bikini top with detachable spaghetti shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck. Clean finish at the edges with folded seams, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sandals in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish. Adjustable foot straps with metal buckles, an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, moulded rubber insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Earrings in various designs. 22 pairs of small studs, one pair of hoop earrings and two pairs with pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 3.5 cm.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Elastic bracelets with wooden beads in various colours.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with hole-knit details. No buttons.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Watch with a metal link bracelet and adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 2.2 cm. Width of links 1 cm, length of bracelet 22 cm.
One-button jacket in a textured bouclé weave containing some wool with notch lapels, front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
One-shoulder top in soft jersey. Narrow strap over one shoulder and a wide, embroidered flounce over the other shoulder.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Hood with appliqués and a print motif. Glittery text print on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Relaxed-fit shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted turtleneck top in jersey with long sleeves.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, reflective strips on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Dance dress in glossy jersey with a glitter print on the front. One long sleeve and one shoulder strap. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Slightly longer at the back.
Short velour T-shirt with an embroidered motif on the front.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and wide, plastic sidepieces. Tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Wrapover bikini top with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ties at the back. Lined.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with appliqués. Buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Fancy dress mask in moulded plastic with sequins and a glittery finish. Satin ribbon ties at the back.

Short dress in airy chiffon with an embroidered pattern, a small, frilled collar with ties at the front and an opening at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons and a short frill trim. Gathered seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Round-necked jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille yarn with a velvety-smooth finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slides in faux fur with a small platform. Rubber soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with an opening and lacing at the sides.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Kids Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Ankle-length, straight-style dress in a textured-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Slits in the sides and an overlocked hem.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Organic cotton jersey top with a wide neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Popover jacket in printed woven fabric with a detachable, mesh-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip at the top. Kangaroo pocket, a zip in one side, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Wide, straight-cut sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a round, slightly wider neckline, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Soft, wide top with a small stand-up collar that is folded in, and dropped shoulders.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves, a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. One dress has an all-over print.

prod_name: Buzz padded soft bra back det
detail_desc: Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and front fastening.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved top and leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in creases at the front.
Glittery Alice band with faux fur ears and a padded unicorn horn and tulle at the top.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Relaxed Fit.
Wallet in grained leather with one note compartment, one zipped coin compartment and three card compartments. Size 8.5x11 cm.
V-neck blouse in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with buttons at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Slim, high-waisted trousers with a zip at the top.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of bottoms in soft satin. Shirt with a V-neck, collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Shorts woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some cotton. High, pleated paper bag waist, a detachable tie belt, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a ribbed polo neck and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Straight hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.
Fitted, long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck at the front, seam at the waist and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the front and lined skirt.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Regular waist, zip fly and button, discreet side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Partially concealed tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy denim with a zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
